mapper.update:
update gdeupsb.TRSP_FEE_INFO
BR_NO = #{brNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
CAR_TYP = #{carTyp,jdbcType=CHAR},
CAR_NO = #{carNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
TCUS_NM = #{tcusNm,jdbcType=CHAR},
PAY_MON = #{payMon,jdbcType=CHAR},
PAY_DAT = #{payDat,jdbcType=DATE},
PAY_NOD = #{payNod,jdbcType=CHAR},
PAY_TLR = #{payTlr,jdbcType=CHAR},
PAY_TCK = #{payTck,jdbcType=CHAR},
TXN_AMT = #{txnAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TXN_CNL = #{txnCnl,jdbcType=CHAR},
ACT_TYP = #{actTyp,jdbcType=CHAR},
ACT_NO = #{actNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
TACT_DT = #{tactDt,jdbcType=DATE},
TLOG_NO = #{tlogNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
PRT_NOD = #{prtNod,jdbcType=CHAR},
PRT_TLR = #{prtTlr,jdbcType=CHAR},
RVS_LOG = #{rvsLog,jdbcType=CHAR},
RVS_DAT = #{rvsDat,jdbcType=DATE},
RVS_NOD = #{rvsNod,jdbcType=CHAR},
RVS_TLR = #{rvsTlr,jdbcType=CHAR},
RVS_TCK = #{rvsTck,jdbcType=CHAR},
TCHK_NO = #{tchkNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
CHK_TIM = #{chkTim,jdbcType=TIME},
CHK_FLG = #{chkFlg,jdbcType=CHAR},
INV_NO = #{invNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
BEG_DAT = #{begDat,jdbcType=DATE},
END_DAT = #{endDat,jdbcType=DATE},
CAR_NAME = #{carName,jdbcType=CHAR},
CAR_DZS = #{carDzs,jdbcType=CHAR},
CNT_STD = #{cntStd,jdbcType=CHAR},
FEE_STD = #{feeStd,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CORPUS = #{corpus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LATE_FEE = #{lateFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CLGS = #{clgs,jdbcType=CHAR},
YYBZ = #{yybz,jdbcType=CHAR},
STATUS = '1'
where PAY_LOG = #{payLog,jdbcType=CHAR} AND STATUS = '0'
update gdeupsb.TRSP_FEE_INFO set CHK_FLG = '3' where TCHK_NO = #{tChkNo,jdbcType=CHAR} and CHK_FLG = '0'
mapper.select: select * from gdeupsb.TRSP_FEE_INFO where TCHK_NO=#{tChkNo,jdbcType=CHAR} and CHK_FLG !='1'
select count(*) as COUNT ,sum(TXN_AMT) as SUMTXNAMT from gdeupsb.TRSP_FEE_INFO where TCHK_NO=#{tChkNo,jdbcType=CHAR} and CHK_FLG='1'

select TLOG_NO,INV_NO oinvNo,STATUS,THD_KEY,PAY_LOG,PRT_NOD from gdeupsb.TRSP_FEE_INFO where BR_NO=#{brNo,jdbcType=CHAR} AND CAR_NO=#{carNo,jdbcType=CHAR} AND CAR_TYP=#{carTyp,jdbcType=CHAR} AND TACT_DT=#{tactDt,jdbcType=DATE} ORDER BY TLOG_NO DESC fetch first 1 rows only

update gdeupsb.TRSP_FEE_INFO
CAR_TYP = #{carTyp,jdbcType=CHAR},
CAR_NO = #{carNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
TCUS_NM = #{tcusNm,jdbcType=CHAR},
PAY_MON = #{payMon,jdbcType=CHAR},
PAY_DAT = #{payDat,jdbcType=DATE},
PAY_LOG = #{payLog,jdbcType=CHAR},
PAY_NOD = #{payNod,jdbcType=CHAR},
PAY_TLR = #{payTlr,jdbcType=CHAR},
PAY_TCK = #{payTck,jdbcType=CHAR},
TXN_AMT = #{txnAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TXN_CNL = #{txnCnl,jdbcType=CHAR},
ACT_TYP = #{actTyp,jdbcType=CHAR},
ACT_NO = #{actNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
TACT_DT = #{tactDt,jdbcType=DATE},
TLOG_NO = #{tlogNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
PRT_NOD = #{prtNod,jdbcType=CHAR},
PRT_TLR = #{prtTlr,jdbcType=CHAR},
RVS_LOG = #{rvsLog,jdbcType=CHAR},
RVS_DAT = #{rvsDat,jdbcType=DATE},
RVS_NOD = #{rvsNod,jdbcType=CHAR},
RVS_TLR = #{rvsTlr,jdbcType=CHAR},
RVS_TCK = #{rvsTck,jdbcType=CHAR},
TCHK_NO = #{tchkNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
CHK_TIM = #{chkTim,jdbcType=TIME},
CHK_FLG = #{chkFlg,jdbcType=CHAR},
INV_NO = #{invNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
BEG_DAT = #{begDat,jdbcType=DATE},
END_DAT = #{endDat,jdbcType=DATE},
CAR_NAME = #{carName,jdbcType=CHAR},
CAR_DZS = #{carDzs,jdbcType=CHAR},
CNT_STD = #{cntStd,jdbcType=CHAR},
FEE_STD = #{feeStd,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CORPUS = #{corpus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

where THD_KEY = #{thdKey,jdbcType=CHAR} AND STATUS = '0' AND BR_NO= #{brNo,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select STATUS,count(*) count,count(TXN_AMT) amt from gdeupsb.TRSP_FEE_INFO where BR_NO = #{bk,jdbcType=CHAR} and((STATUS='0' AND (PAY_DAT between #{startDate,jdbcType=CHAR} AND #{endDate,jdbcType=CHAR} ) and PAY_NOD= #{nodNo,jdbcType=CHAR}) or (STATUS='1' AND (TACT_DT between #{startDate,jdbcType=CHAR} AND #{endDate,jdbcType=CHAR}) and PRT_NOD= #{nodNo,jdbcType=CHAR}) or ((STATUS='2' or STATUS='3') AND (RVS_DAT between #{startDate,jdbcType=CHAR} AND #{endDate,jdbcType=CHAR}) AND RVS_NOD= #{nodNo,jdbcType=CHAR})) group by STATUS

SELECT count(*) as OrnCnt,value(sum(cast(Txn_Amt as BIGINT)),0) as OrnAmt, value(sum(case when Status='1' then 1 else 0 end ),0) as SucCnt, value(sum(case when Status='1' then BIGINT(Txn_Amt) else 0 end ),0) as SucAmt FROM gdeupsb.TRSP_FEE_INFO WHERE Br_No= #{bk,jdbcType=CHAR} AND ((Status='0' and (Pay_Dat between #{startDate,jdbcType=CHAR} AND #{endDate,jdbcType=CHAR}) and (Pay_Nod= #{nodNo,jdbcType=CHAR})) OR (Status='1' and (TAct_Dt between #{startDate,jdbcType=CHAR} AND #{endDate,jdbcType=CHAR}) and (Prt_Nod= #{nodNo,jdbcType=CHAR}) ) OR ((Status='2' or Status='3') and (Rvs_Dat between #{startDate,jdbcType=CHAR} AND #{endDate,jdbcType=CHAR}) and (Rvs_Nod= #{nodNo,jdbcType=CHAR})))

select
from gdeupsb.TRSP_FEE_INFO where (PAY_DAT BETWEEN #{startDate,jdbcType=DATE} AND #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE}) and STATUS='0'
